name: Data Scientist
details: Developing statistical analysis and machine learning models. Requires strong analytical and technical skills. High scientific acumen is required.

name: Marketing Manager
details: Analyzing market trends, creating creative campaign strategies, and managing teams. Strategic, social, and communication acumen are at the forefront.

name: Software Architect
details: Ensuring the design and structural integrity of large systems. Analytical, technical, and practical acumen are crucial. High abstract thinking skills are expected.
